summary: This document is an email chain from June 30, 2022, forwarding a completed Civilian Crime Report form against Ghislaine Maxwell. The email indicates the report was received and the sender was advised not to expect further contact, with a request for guidance on whether to send it to a unit for review.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The target of multiple completed Civilian Crime Report forms received via interoffice mail.

events.title: Civilian Crime Report Against Maxwell Received
events.description: Multiple completed Civilian Crime Report forms targeting Ghislaine Maxwell were received via interoffice mail, prompting internal email correspondence about handling the report.

keyFacts: A Civilian Crime Report form was completed and submitted against Ghislaine Maxwell in June 2022.
The report was received via interoffice mail with no writing on the envelope.
The recipient advised the submitter that the report was received but not to expect any further contact.
Internal email correspondence discusses whether to forward the report to a unit for review.
